original_text: And the Lord sent fiery serpents among the people, and they bit the people; and much people of Israel died.
korean_text: 여호와께서 불뱀들을 백성 중에 보내어 백성을 물게 하시므로 이스라엘 백성 중에 죽은 자가 많은지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord sent fiery serpents among the people
and much people of Israel died
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 중에 많은 사람이 죽었더라
